displayName.text: Legendary Lin Tax Service 華聯會計事務所

formattedAddress: 7 Chatham Square # 402, New York, NY 10038, USA
adrFormatAddress: 7 Chatham Square # 402, New York, NY 10038, USA

originalText.text: Tom and his team are truly the best and most professional. I've been working with Tom for over six years now. He is very knowledgeable and very helpful. He does all my payroll, accounts and taxes for my business. We highly recommend him! Thank you Tom for all you do for us!

text.text: Tom and his team are truly the best and most professional. I've been working with Tom for over six years now. He is very knowledgeable and very helpful. He does all my payroll, accounts and taxes for my business. We highly recommend him! Thank you Tom for all you do for us!

originalText.text:
For the past two years, I have been using an MBA specific accountant that understands the intricacies involved with writing down tuition.  Since I recently graduated, I no longer require the specialty services of an MBA accountant.

My wife has been using Tom's services for the past 3 years without issue.  She recommended that I reach out to Tom as well so I decided to give it a shot.

In the beginning, Tom was very responsive.  After the initial quote was provided, I decided to move forward and proceeded to upload all of my documents.

Fast forward a month, we received an email from Tom on 3/22/2020 asking for a service agreement document to be signed.  Because we did not respond with a signed document within 72 hours (3/25/2020), Tom refunded our money saying it was a business risk.

Unbelievable.  If you do end up working with Tom, I'm sure his services are great.  That being said, Tom needs to learn how to be a better professional.

originalText.text: Professional Accounting Service! Thomas provides very professional tax advice to my business. He told me about tax deductions and credit that I was qualified for! I would definitely recommend him!

originalText.text: Thomas and his team are very knowledgeable, trustworthy and responsible accounting professionals. Great to have a tax accountant like him to solve my problem. Highly recommended!!

originalText.text: Very professional and experienced.  Conveniently located in Chinatown and I would highly recommend the office for both personal and business tax return.
